mapper.select: SELECT mno, mem.m_id, m_name, m_email, m_img, m_pw, m_birth, m_phone, m_address, m_signup_date, enabled, auth FROM member_tb mem LEFT OUTER JOIN authorities auth ON mem.m_id = auth.m_id WHERE mem.m_id = #{m_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_tb (cart_no, cart_count, m_id, pno, cart_regdate) VALUES (cart_seq.nextval, #{cart_count}, #{m_id}, #{pno}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT c.m_id, c.cart_count, p.pno, p.p_title, p.p_price, p.p_img, p.p_author, p.p_price, p.p_dc_rate, p.p_publish_company, p.p_publish_date FROM product_tb p, cart_tb c WHERE c.pno = p.pno AND c.m_id = #{m_id} ORDER BY c.cart_no asc
